Interface ScoreComponent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<ScoreComponent>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicScoreComponent, DivisiveScoreComponent

    public interface ScoreComponent
extends Comparable<ScoreComponent>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int composite(int oldValue)
      Accepts the current score and returns the composited score.
      int getPrecedence()
      Used for implementation of Comparable.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo

    • Method Detail

      • getPrecedence

        int getPrecedence()
        Used for implementation of Comparable.
        Returns:
        precedence precedence must be implemented such that the components that are applied earlier return a higher precedence than components applied later. Two components with the same precedence cannot exist in the same list. When compareTo is implemented the resulting order should place the components with high precedence first and the components with low precedence last.

      • composite

        int composite(int oldValue)
        Accepts the current score and returns the composited score.
        Parameters:
        oldValue - the score not including this component
        Returns:
        the score after including this component
